Wi Kuki Kaa as [[Ghân-buri-Ghân]]]]: February 19]], [[2006]]), a New Zealand actor, was originally chosen to play [[Ghân-buri-Ghân]] in ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]'', but his character did not make the shooting phase.
